alert.note: Alert for Adams; Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:18PM MDT until June 29 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN...WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 718 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Shamrock, or 20 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Gary and Woodrow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
